Address.value: 405 MAIN AVENUE WEST,SUITE 2D, WEST FARGO, North Dakota, 58078, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BT Brands Inc operates and owns a fast-food restaurant called Burger Time. The company also operates in Minnesota as a franchisee of Dairy Queen. It offers a variety of burgers and other affordably priced foods such as chicken sandwiches, pulled pork sandwiches, chicken chunks, side dishes, and soft drinks.

value.name: Kenneth William Brimmer
value.title: Chairman, COO, CFO & Principal Accounting Officer
